comment.author: 34427466731@N01
26315450@N06
comment._content:
Definitely a montage --one plane is the mirror image of the other. Some 'smoke' has been added. The picture of the two parachuting men was probably the original over which the 'two' planes were put. 
I struggle to recognize the aircraft type. I think it is either in British or American markings, but it looks more like a German WW I plane to me, a Rumpler perhaps. German types were known to have flown for the US Forces long after WW I. I'm thinking a plane used for Hollywood movies.

comment.author: 26022992@N07
comment._content: Fake, if ever we saw one. Bemused passengers still on board?
